channel.title: When I wield a change then try to wield a 2her, the 2her wield, how I stop it?
channel.description: Well I want to make it not wield but all it says is You can not wield a 2her with a shield.

item.title: When I wield a change then try to wield a 2her, the 2her wield, how I stop it?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Search -

public static int more2handed[]

You should come up with -

public static int more2handed[] = {7158, 1319, 6528, 14915, 13653, 13664, 15351};

Just add your ID in there, like this -

public static int more2handed[] = {7158, 1319, 6528, 14915, 13653, 13664, 15351, 13664};

Save, compile, run, and it should work.

Read full topic

item.title: When I wield a change then try to wield a 2her, the 2her wield, how I stop it?
item.dc:creator: @skittle385 skittle385
item.description:
@skittle385 wrote:

that didnt work i got an error, thi is what i ahve…

public int[] twoHanderz = {7158, 1319, 6528, 14915, 13664, 13214, 15333, 15334, 15335, 15336, 15351}; public boolean is2Hander() { for (int I = 0; I < twoHanderz.length; I++) { if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == twoHanderz[i]) { return true; } } return false; }

and it goes to this…

[code] case 41: // wear item
int wearID = inStream.readUnsignedWord();
int wearSlot = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();

        interfaceID = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();
        for (int I = 0; I < twoHanderz.length; I++) {
            if (wearSlot == 5 && is2Hander()) {
                sendMessage(
                        "Two handed item = You cant equip a 2hander with a shield");
            } else if (playerEquipment[playerShield] != -1
                    && wearID == twoHanderz[I]) {
                sendMessage("You cant equip a two-hand weapon with a shield");
            } else {
                wear(wearID, wearSlot);
            }
        }
        flushOutStream();
        break;                           [/code]

Read full topic
item.source: When I wield a change then try to wield a 2her, the 2her wield, how I stop it?

item.title: When I wield a change then try to wield a 2her, the 2her wield, how I stop it?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

I’ve answered your other thread already, but here…

Search this in your client class -

int[] two_hand

You should get something like this -

int[] two_hand = {841, 6609, 1319, 4718, 4726, 1409, 4710, 7158, 8100, 3204, 4755, 4153, 4827,667,35,2402,746, 6528,843,845,849,847,853,851,859,857,861, 4734,4214,4215,4216,4217,4218,4219,4220,4221,4222,4223, 4747 }; for (int element : two_hand) { if ((wearID == element) && (playerEquipment[playerShield] > 0)) { if (playerHasItem(-1)) { addItem(playerEquipment[playerShield], 1); playerEquipment[playerShield] = -1; playerEquipmentN[playerShield] = 0; setEquipment(-1, 0, playerShield); } else { sM("Not enough space in your inventory."); return false; } }

Add your dragon claw item ID in there.

Read full topic
